message: Start with a generous offer to set the tone for the negotiations.
Let's split it 50/50, a fair and reasonable offer
You're close, but I think I can get a better deal. I'll try to negotiate further.
A bit more to the middle, but I'm still holding out for a better deal.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied with the split. I want a bit more
I'm not willing to give up that much more. I'll try to push for an even better deal.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive now. Meet me in the middle, or I'll keep pushing.
I'm not giving up yet. I think I can get a better deal if you're willing to compromise
No way, I'm not giving up 2/3 of the money! I'll try to find a better compromise.
Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up everything.
